CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Veridian Plains relative to Azure Coast?
SRP.A: Veridian Plains is {above} Azure Coast in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Delta relative to Sunstone Desert?
SRP.A: Golden Delta is {above} Sunstone Desert in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Coast relative to Sunstone Desert?
SRP.A: Azure Coast is {below} Sunstone Desert in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total construction starts?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Azure Coast}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total construction starts?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sunstone Desert}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Azure Coast's maximum Construction Starts in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Azure Coast's maximum Construction Starts is in {1996}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sunstone Desert's minimum Construction Starts in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sunstone Desert's minimum Construction Starts is in {1977}.

NC.Q: Was the total Construction Starts in 1993 higher or lower than in 1995?
NC.A: The total construction starts in 1993 was {lower} than in 1995.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1987, was the average total Construction Starts higher or lower than between 1974 and 1979?
NC.A: The average total construction starts between 1985 and 1987 was {higher} than between 1974 and 1979.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1981, was the average total Construction Starts higher or lower than between 1971 and 1982?
NC.A: The average total construction starts between 1976 and 1981 was {higher} than between 1971 and 1982.

NC.Q: Was the total Construction Starts in 1972 higher or lower than in 1992?
NC.A: The total construction starts in 1972 was {lower} than in 1992.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Azure Coast} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Azure Coast and Veridian Plains first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Azure Coast and Veridian Plains did not exchange leading positions.
